verbose_text: Some examples are the sum of cadaverine and putrescine, the index of Mietz and Karmas, which considers the increases in putrescine, cadaverine and histamine levels along with the corresponding decreases in spermidine and spermine, as well as the index described by Veciana-Nogues et al. for tuna, which includes putrescine, cadaverine, histamine, and tyramine.
